tier.item: Besi [Donohue 1999]
a. No-kiki'i te ana na 'obu kene no-tode.

3-bite
`The dog bit the child, and fled.'

tier.item: (i) No-ala te kaujawa kene kene=no ako te ama=no

COM B EN CORE
kene embere kua kampo di hawu'a.
INSTR bucket village f i el d
ALL OB L
`They fetched cassava to the village with their friends for their father with buckets in the field.'
